item.description:
Hear from an expert on healthy eating and organic living about the...   6 Healthy Foods You Should Be Eating

*Name, forms, what they do for you

* When and where and for who they are appropriate, vs. similar foods, energetics

* Where to get them and how to incorporate them into meals

* Handout with recipes and more...

The first 15 people to sign up gets a free gift! Plus - David is giving away 2 free six month weight loss programs worth $149 (includes recipes, tips, unlimited email support)!

Presenter,

David L. Kagan  has 25 years of experience in plant-based nutrition, alternative health, fitness, and self help. He was able to reverse his own problems including:

  • Hypertension
  • Depression/Anger
  • Allergies
  • Frequent & Long Acute Illnesses
  • Fatigue & Weakness
  • Knee, hip, neck, ankle and back pain
  • Vision problems
  • Tinnitus

David has also successfully counseled family, friends and clients on preventing and reversing illness, and creating a better life, for more than a decade. For more info check out his website at: www.kagan.com
item.name: New Year Healthy Foods Seminar
